title: [The Journalist : publicity kit]
brief_description: Publicity kit for the production The Journalist (1979), including 11 B&W Stills (Large), 3 Press Kit/ Reviews. Director Michael Thornhill, Starring Jack Thompson, Elizabeth Alexander, Sam Neill, Carol Raye, Penne Hackforth-Jones, Charles ‘Bud’ Tingwell.
